HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: - New: You can now add new restaurants via the register. Each needs at least one register. |- New: Registers now have a radius. Only tables and food inside the radius will be served. |- New: Japanese translation (thanks to Melnus) |- Tweak: Waiting and serving gives social XP (thanks to Mitchell-Brown) |img:images/Patron |caption:Updating Gastronomy takes a lot of time. To sustain my mod development, I'm running a Patreon page that I need your help with. You can join my community for direct support, discussing my mods and giving feedback. So if you feel curious, grateful or generous, please take a look by clicking the link above! |If this mod update causes issues, don't hesitate to contact me (and remember to include the Ctrl-F12 error log!).
